Package client.lobbyWindow

Class LobbyViewModel

java.lang.Object
client.lobbyWindow.LobbyViewModel
public class LobbyViewModel extends Object
Binds the data coming from the LobbyModel with its respective GUI-elements and manages the presentation logic for the lobby window
Author:
Nargess Ahmadi, Felicia Saruba, Li MingHao
